title: Find a job with Universal Jobmatch

details.description: Find a job using the Universal Jobmatch service - jobseekers can match their CV and skills to jobs posted by companies
details.alternative_title: Universal Jobmatch job search and matching
details.more_information:
Register with Universal Jobmatch or login to your existing account for services including saved job searches, email alerts and keeping track of your past applications. You can still search and apply for jobs without an account.

Universal Jobmatch has replaced the Jobcentre Plus job search tool.

If you’re having problems registering with Universal Jobmatch:

  • check your email spam folder for the confirmation email
  • make a note of the Government Gateway number during the signup process - you will need this to sign in again later

Search for jobs in Northern Ireland with Jobcentre Online.
